plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

accepted.name: Marta IB
accepted.description:
Hola! I am passionate UX designer, who specializes in crafting user experiences that are accessible, thoughtful, and truly enjoyable.
https://martaib.com/

plugins.tagline: Enhance your design flow with Component Viewer—highlight and manage your Figma components easily!

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.
plugins.tagline: Refine your UX copy writing to make it more concise, friendly and scannable.

plugins.name: Insta Component
plugins.description:
The Insta Component plugin allows users to create components more easily. For example, when a user runs the plugin on a frame layer, it will create a master component on the side and convert the frame into an instance in the same location.


Thanks to @tang for testing the plugin.
plugins.tagline: create component faster

59637.name: Insta Component
59637.description:
The Insta Component plugin allows users to create components more easily. For example, when a user runs the plugin on a frame layer, it will create a master component on the side and convert the frame into an instance in the same location.


Thanks to @tang for testing the plugin.

plugins.name: PinNote
plugins.description:
Comunique com clareza. Colabore com eficiência.

Com o PinNote, você pode adicionar notas diretamente nos elementos do design. Cada nota pode ser classificada por categorias inteligentes como Acessibilidade, Desenvolvimento, Interações, Bug Report, Regra de Negócio, entre outras. Cada categoria oferece recursos específicos, como trechos de código, mensagens para leitores de tela, descrição de interações e links.


O plugin também permite criar categorias personalizadas com ícones e cores definidas por você! As notas são organizadas automaticamente, com posicionamento inteligente e numeração visual, facilitando a leitura mesmo em arquivos complexos.



Para quem é esse plugin?

O PinNote foi criado para:

  1. Product Designers que querem entregar projetos mais claros, documentados e colaborativos.
  2. UX/UI Designers que precisam deixar orientações específicas sobre interações, regras de negócio e acessibilidade.
  3. Desenvolvedores que desejam encontrar rapidamente tudo o que precisam para implementar uma interface com fidelidade.
  4. Líderes de produto e stakeholders que querem acompanhar decisões de design com transparência.
  5. Times multidisciplinares que buscam reduzir fricções no processo de handoff e ganhar eficiência.



FAQ - Perguntas Frequentes

Como faço para mover uma nota depois de criada?

R: As notas podem ser movidas normalmente como qualquer outro elemento do Figma. Basta selecionar e arrastar para a nova posição. O indicador numérico permanecerá vinculado ao elemento original.


É possível editar uma nota existente?

R: Sim, basta dar duplo clique na nota para abrir o modo de edição. Você pode modificar título, descrição, código e outros campos. A tag principal não pode ser alterada para manter a consistência.


Como funciona a numeração automática?

R: A numeração é sequencial por elemento. Quando você habilita a numeração, o plugin mantém um contador global e atribui o próximo número disponível. A numeração persiste mesmo se você deletar notas intermediárias.


As cores das tags são personalizáveis?

R: Cada tag tem uma cor padrão otimizada para legibilidade, mas elas podem ser alteradas de acordo com as preferências do usuário. As tags estão definidas por default como:

- Acessibilidade: #00EEFF

- Desenvolvimento: #55EF71

- Nota: #F9E444

- Alterações: #FF9925

- Regra de negócio: #CD79F4

- Interações: #FF5959

- Bug report: #FF59C8


Existe um limite de notas por elemento?

R: Não há limite técnico, mas por questões de organização e legibilidade, recomendamos não criar mais que 3-4 notas por elemento.


Como as notas são organizadas quando há várias no mesmo elemento?

R: O plugin posiciona as notas automaticamente, primeiro tentando à direita e depois abaixo das notas existentes, mantendo um espaçamento de 16px entre elas.


O plugin funciona com componentes do Figma?

R: Sim, o plugin funciona com qualquer elemento selecionável do Figma, incluindo componentes, instâncias, grupos e frames.


Outros usuários podem ver minhas notas?

R: Sim, as notas são visíveis para todos que têm acesso ao arquivo do Figma. O nome do autor e timestamp são preservados para manter o histórico.


É possível comentar em notas existentes?

R: Atualmente não há sistema de comentários nas notas, mas você pode usar o sistema de comentários nativo do Figma para discutir sobre uma nota específica ou editar o conteúdo da nota.


Posso criar tags personalizadas?

R: Sim, usando a opção "Personalizado" você pode definir sua própria cor e ícone para a tag. As configurações são salvas para reutilização.


Quais idiomas o PinNote suporta?

R: O PinNote possui suporte para os idiomas português (padrão), inglês e espanhol, permitindo que você utilize o plugin no idioma que preferir.


Posso desativar a exibição do nome do autor e da data nas notas?

R: Sim! É possível ocultar o nome do autor e a data de criação das notas através do botão mais opções, deixando a visualização mais limpa conforme sua necessidade.


Dá para desativar a criação dos marcadores numéricos nas notas?

R: Sim, você pode desativar a criação dos indicadores, através do botão mais opções, para que as notas fiquem sem numeração visual, caso prefira um layout mais simples.


Como personalizar as cores das tags?

R: Você pode escolher cores diferentes das definidas por padrão para as tags. O PinNote sugere cores acessíveis, alinhadas às diretrizes WCAG, para garantir boa legibilidade. Além disso, é possível inserir qualquer cor personalizada usando códigos hexadecimais, acessando a opção “mais cores”.
plugins.tagline: Facilite a comunicação no Figma com notas visuais que destacam informações importantes no seu design

plugins.name: Randominator
plugins.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
plugins.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

132327.name: Randominator
132327.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
132327.release_notes:
🎉 New Update: Randominator v1.1.0

We're excited to bring you new randomization features to make your designs even more dynamic!

✨ New Features:
• Rotation Randomization: Add random rotation to your selected elements with customizable min/max angles
• Layer Order Randomization: Shuffle the stacking order of your selected layers for quick variations
• Improved Scale Behavior: More intuitive scaling with better default values

🛠️ UI Improvements:
• Updated interface layout for better usability
• Reset default color randomization values for more predictable results
• Enhanced slider controls for better precision

Try these new features by selecting multiple elements and adjusting the rotation range or enabling layer order randomization in the plugin panel.

Happy randomizing! 🎨
132327.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

plugins.name: DT组件高亮 DT Component Highlighting
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

•Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

•Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

•Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

•Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the “Show Component Highlight” button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the “Locate” button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click “Hide Component Highlight.”


Notes

•The highlighted components are based on the plugin’s interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

•The plugin’s results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件允许用户在设计中直观地高亮显示疑似组件，帮助轻松定位和管理组件。非常适合需要快速检查和交互多个组件的用户。


功能说明

•在选定的画框中高亮显示疑似组件。

•在 Figma 文件中定位并聚焦到组件。

•导出组件的缩略图以供视觉参考。

•轻松切换组件高亮状态。


使用方法

1.从 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个画框。

2.点击“显示组件高亮”按钮，高亮显示疑似组件。

3.查看带有缩略图和名称的组件列表。

4.点击“定位”按钮，放大并选择特定组件。

5.如需移除高亮，请点击“隐藏组件高亮”。


注意事项

•高亮显示的组件基于插件的解读，可能与实际组件使用情况不完全一致。

  1. •插件结果仅供参考，实际效果可能会因设计复杂性而有所不同。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Easily Highlight and Manage DT Components in Your Design

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

Notes

•The plugin’s results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.

使用方法

1.从 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个画框。

2.点击“显示组件高亮”按钮，高亮显示疑似组件。

3.查看带有缩略图和名称的组件列表。

4.点击“定位”按钮，放大并选择特定组件。

plugins.name: Mermaid-to-Flow
plugins.description:
Transform Mermaid markup into professional FigJam flowcharts with smart layouts, text wrapping, edge labels, and industry-standard color coding.


Features:

• Smart hierarchical layouts with automatic positioning

• Professional color coding (green start, red end, yellow decisions)

• Edge labels for annotated workflows (A -->|"label"| B)

• Shape-specific text wrapping for clean diagrams

• Support for rectangles [text], diamonds {text}, and ellipses (text)

• Both top-down (TD) and left-right (LR) layouts

• No external dependencies - works entirely within FigJam


Perfect for business process documentation, software workflows, and technical diagrams. Simply paste your Mermaid code and generate publication-ready flowcharts instantly.
plugins.tagline: Convert Mermaid markup to FigJam flowcharts

137859.name: Mermaid-to-Flow
137859.description:
Transform Mermaid markup into professional FigJam flowcharts with smart layouts, text wrapping, edge labels, and industry-standard color coding.


Features:

• Smart hierarchical layouts with automatic positioning

• Professional color coding (green start, red end, yellow decisions)

• Edge labels for annotated workflows (A -->|"label"| B)

• Shape-specific text wrapping for clean diagrams

• Support for rectangles [text], diamonds {text}, and ellipses (text)

• Both top-down (TD) and left-right (LR) layouts

• No external dependencies - works entirely within FigJam


Perfect for business process documentation, software workflows, and technical diagrams. Simply paste your Mermaid code and generate publication-ready flowcharts instantly.
137859.release_notes:
## [2.7.1] - 2025-06-15

### 🐛 Critical Bug Fixes
- **Fixed standalone node parsing**: Now correctly parses both standalone node definitions and edge connections
  - **Issue**: Nodes were displaying IDs (Q, C, T) instead of text labels ("Pick a drink", "Coffee", "Tea")
  - **Root cause**: Parser only processed edge connections, ignored standalone node definitions
  - **Solution**: Enhanced parser to handle both `Q{Pick a drink}` definitions AND `Q --> C` connections
- **Complete syntax support**: All node types now correctly display text labels
  - `[Rectangle text]` ✅
  - `{Diamond text}` ✅ 
  - `(Ellipse text)` ✅
  - `([Ellipse text])` ✅ (both ellipse syntaxes supported)

### 🔧 Code Quality Improvements
- **Removed dead code**: Eliminated unused `_calculateLegacyLayout()` function (39 lines removed)
- **Optimized function signatures**: Removed unused `levels` parameter from `resolveNodeCollisions()`
- **Consolidated configuration**: Created unified `SHAPE_CONFIG` object for all node types
  - **Before**: Scattered across `getShapeTextConfig()`, `getNodeColors()`, `getShapeType()`
  - **After**: Single source of truth with `SHAPE_CONFIG` and `ROLE_COLORS` objects
- **Enhanced documentation**: Added comprehensive JSDoc comments for all public functions
- **Improved linting**: Created `.eslintignore` to exclude generated `code.js` file

### 🧪 Testing & Validation
- **Extensive test coverage**: Verified with 5 diverse Mermaid test cases
  - Mixed node types with edge labels ✅
  - Left-right layouts with long text ✅
  - Complex branching decision trees ✅
  - Simple linear processes ✅
  - Multiple start/end points ✅
- **Version logging**: Added console logging to verify latest code is running
- **Clean builds**: All code compiles without errors and passes linting

### 📊 Benefits
- ✅ **Correct text display** - All node text labels now show properly instead of IDs
- ✅ **Complete Mermaid support** - Both standalone definitions and edge syntax work perfectly
- ✅ **Maintainable codebase** - Cleaner code with consolidated configuration and documentation
- ✅ **Production ready** - Robust parsing handles real-world Mermaid syntax patterns
- ✅ **Developer experience** - JSDoc documentation and clean code structure
137859.tagline: Convert Mermaid markup to FigJam flowcharts

plugins.name: multiple borders
plugins.description:
multiple borders is an easy-to-use Figma plugin that lets you add multiple borders (strokes) to vector shapes and elements.


with multiple borders, you can:

  1. create complex layered border designs
  2. customize each border's color, weight, and type
  3. enhance design flexibility for icons, buttons, and graphic elements
  4. streamline the process of creating intricate border effects


if you have feedback or run into any bugs, dm me on twitter @coleschfr :)


happy designing!

plugins.name: Floating Finder
plugins.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
plugins.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

130130.description:

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


🎯 Key Features:

• Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


🎨 Flexible Options:

• Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


🔍 Smart Selection:

• Apply to selected elements only

• Include all children elements

• Preserve component instances


💡 Perfect For:

• Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

• Cleaning up imported designs

• Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

• Standardizing measurements across teams


⚡️ Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ❤️ for the Figma Community
plugins.tagline: Round your design values to consistent multiples for pixel-perfect layouts

plugins.name: Color Me Softly
plugins.description: The plugin extracts the dominant color from an image using the ColorThief algorithm, reduces its opacity to 0.3 (against a white background), and converts the adjusted color to a hex value you can use in your designs. It’s great for creating subtle backgrounds for images.
plugins.tagline: Tiny little helper to generate a soft color tone based on the dominant color of an image

plugins.name: Halftone Converter
plugins.description:
This tool transforms any selected image into a customizable halftone effect, using individual ellipse layers to simulate tonal shading. You can control:


•Dot Size – Adjust the diameter of each dot to refine visual granularity

•Dot Density – Increase or decrease how many dots are used to represent the image


Once applied, the halftone output is placed in a Figma frame as editable ellipses, allowing for manual adjustment, recoloring, or animation. It’s ideal for designers looking to stylize artwork with a print-inspired, dot-matrix look.
plugins.tagline: Transform any image into editable halftone dots. Adjust size, density, and style directly in Figma.

137209.description:

plugins.name: Just Notes
plugins.description:
✏️ Create & edit notes — Add contextual notes right next to your designs. Edit them anytime to keep your team in the loop.

🎨 Customize your categories — Tailor categories to fit your workflow: rename them, change colors, or add new ones.

📌 Smart object linking — Notes stay linked to the layers they were created for. If things move around, just sync and your notes will snap back into place.


How to use:

To add a note: select an object, fill in the form, click Add note.

To edit a note: click on it, make changes in the form, click Save.
plugins.tagline: Clear notes for seamless handoffs

plugins.name: 语言文本替换工具
plugins.description:
使用流程


快速将设计稿中的文本替换为目标语言，只需以下几步：


  1. 选中设计元素或画板 在Figma中，选中需要替换文本的设计元素或整个画板（提示：确保选中的元素包含需要替换的文本图层）
  2. 打开插件 在Figma顶部菜单栏中，点击“插件” > 搜索并打开“多国语言文本替换”（或通过快捷方式运行）
  3. 上传翻译文档 在插件界面中，点击“上传文件”按钮，选择你的 .xlsx 翻译文档。 注意：翻译文档需按照以下规范准备：
  4. 文档必须包含两列：第一列为源文本，第二列为目标文本。
  5. 默认列名：A1 为“源文本”（如“英语”），B1 为“目标文本”（如“阿拉伯语”）
  6. 输入源文本与目标文本列名 在插件界面的输入框中，输入或确认翻译文档中的源文本列名（例如“英语”）和目标文本列名（例如“阿拉伯语”）
  7. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变
  8. 查看替换结果
plugins.tagline: 语言文本替换工具

  7. 点击“开始替换” 确认无误后，点击插件界面上的“开始替换”按钮。 插件会自动扫描选中的设计元素，匹配源文本并替换为目标文本，同时保持原始布局不变
  8. 查看替换结果

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.name: Muhammad Faizan Atiq
accepted.description: Hey there! I’m a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

126526.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
126526.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!
126526.release_notes:
Release Notes v2.0.0

✨ New Features:
• Create sections with custom background colors
• Organize elements horizontally or vertically
• Adjust spacing and padding between elements
• Set maximum section width for better layout control

🛠️ Improvements:
• Sections are created exactly where you select elements
• Consistent spacing between rows in horizontal layout
• Smooth color picker with preset swatches
• Modern dark theme UI with glassmorphism effects

🐛 Fixed:
• Section positioning now matches native Figma behavior
• Color picker no longer gets cropped in the UI
• Layout spacing issues in multi-row sections
126526.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

plugins.name: Multiple Text Clone Components
plugins.description:
Summary

Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

When multiple lines of text are entered, they are duplicated with “1 line = 1 component”.

Example: Running with 3 lines of text will duplicate 3 components


コンポーネントを複製して事前に入力したテキストを挿入するプラグインです。

複数行のテキストを入力すると「1行=1コンポーネント」で複製されます。

例：3行分のテキストを入力すると3つのコンポーネントが複製される


Use

  1. Create Components
  2. Place text inside components or add text properties
  3. Enter the text you want to duplicate in the plugin panel
  4. Select and run the component created in 2.


  1. コンポーネントを作成
  2. コンポーネントの中にテキストを配置、もしくはテキストプロパティを追加
  3. 複製したいテキストをプラグインパネルに入力
  4. 2で作成したコンポーネントを選択して実行
plugins.tagline: Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

plugins.name: Typosys
plugins.description:
Typosys is a Figma plugin designed to simplify and accelerate the creation and management of typography systems.

By selecting a base font and size, you can effortlessly generate styles that scale proportionally. The plugin supports custom naming, font faces, weights, sizes, line heights, and letter spacing. It also introduces a multi-dimensional mode system, allowing you to tailor styles for specific devices like desktop, tablet, and mobile. Once completed, the styles are imported into Figma, fully linked to dynamically generated variable collections.



Benefits


  1. Faster workflow: Set up your typography system in minutes.
  2. Consistent scaling: Styles are proportional to the base size for a cohesive design.
  3. Flexibility: Each style can be individually customized.
  4. Device-specific optimization: Use modes to adjust styles for different screen sizes.
  5. Variable integration: Styles are automatically connected to dynamic Figma variable collections.



Key Features


  1. Base font and size selection
  2. Proportional typography style generation
  3. Customizable font face, weight, size, line-height, and letter-spacing
  4. Mode-based dimensions (Desktop, Tablet, Mobile)
  5. Automatic variable generation and linking
  6. One-click import

accepted.name: Roland Hidvegi
accepted.description: Roland Hidvegi is a Product Designer — crafting digital experiences, from vision to final touches, passionate about creating things that make people happy.

plugins.tagline: Streamline your typography system in seconds.

110303.description:

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you’re working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We’re really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We’ve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

Why did we create PageStream?

We’re really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We’ve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
131215.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: ColorSync by Blader
plugins.description:
Plugin Description


ColorSync by Blader is an advanced tool for designers who need to generate professional color palettes, precise color harmonies, and perfectly balanced gradients. It uses functional algorithms to ensure professional-quality results directly in Figma.


Detailed Feature Breakdown


1. Core Controls


Color Picker


  1. Function: Sets the base color for all harmonies.
  2. Usage: Click to select any hue or manually enter HEX values.


Color Quantity


  1. Function: Controls palette size (1-20 colors).
  2. Pro Tip: Use 3-5 colors for minimalism, 10+ for complex systems.


Color Format


  1. Options: HEX, RGB, HSL.
  2. Function: Toggles value display (e.g., #FF5733 → rgb(255, 87, 51) → hsl(12, 100%, 60%)).


Dark/Light Mode


  1. Function: Optimizes UI for low-light or bright environments.


2. Harmony Types


  1. Each option uses color theory principles:


Complementary


  1. What it does: Creates 2 opposing colors (180° apart).
  2. Best for: Maximum contrast (CTAs, alerts).


Analogous


  1. What it does: Generates 3-5 adjacent colors (30° increments).
  2. Best for: Harmonious designs (branding, backgrounds).


Tints, Shades & Tones


  1. What it does: Produces luminosity/saturation variations (+20% tints, -20% shades).
  2. Best for: Design systems needing consistent scales.


Compound


  1. What it does: Blends complementary + analogous colors (4-6 colors).
  2. Best for: Data viz, illustrations requiring depth.


3. Output Sections


Generated Palette


  1. Content: Displays colors based on your settings.
  2. Pro Tip: Click any swatch to copy its value.


Color Buttons


  1. Function: Compact palette for quick design integration.


Gradient Generator


  1. What it does: Creates CSS-ready gradients from your palette.
  2. Usage: Copy/paste directly into Figma styles or CSS.


4. Advanced Features


Multilingual Support


  1. English, Spanish, and Chinese localization.


Smart Copy


On click:


  1. Shows "Copied!" confirmation
  2. Auto-formats to selected color space


Professional Use Cases


  1. UI Design: Build component libraries with perfect contrast ratios.
  2. Branding: Test logo color combinations instantly.
  3. Illustration: Find coherent shadow/light palettes.
  4. Presentations: Create slide decks with harmonious schemes.


Sample Workflow


  1. Set corporate blue (#2E86AB) as base color.


  1. Select "Compound" harmony with 6 colors.
  2. Copy the auto-generated gradient for hero banners.
  3. Export HSL values for design documentation.
plugins.tagline: Pro-grade color harmonies & palettes in one click

plugins.name: QR code Maker
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!


Feature Suggestions:


Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.
plugins.tagline: Stylize & Export QR Codes – Your Way!

124705.name: QR code Maker
124705.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!

Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.

124705.tagline: Stylize & Export QR Codes – Your Way!

plugins.name: Text Style Group Clone
plugins.description:
This simple plugin duplicates local text styles by hierarchy. It’s useful when creating multiple text styles, such as sans-serif and serif, or desktop and mobile variants.

Due to Figma API limitations, font settings such as Details and Variables are not copied.


登録されているテキストスタイルをグループごと複製するのプラグインです。

Figma APIで取得できないOpenType FeaturesやVariable設定はコピーできません。
plugins.tagline: Duplicate hierarchical text styles. (Only basic font settings are copied.)

120111.name: Text Style Group Clone
120111.description:

plugins.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
plugins.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It’s perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you’re working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
plugins.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision — organize your designs by the spectrum

115283.name: Color Frequency Visualizer
115283.description:
Color Frequency is a powerful plugin for Figma that helps you analyze and visualize the color distribution within your designs. By sorting pixels based on color frequency, the plugin gives you a clear understanding of your design's color balance. It’s perfect for designers looking to ensure harmonious color usage and improve overall design aesthetics.


The plugin can also help you apply the classic 60/30/10 rule of color proportion, ensuring that your primary, secondary, and accent colors are balanced in your design. Whether you’re working on UI designs or visual compositions, Color Frequency helps maintain color harmony and creates visually pleasing layouts with ease.
115283.tagline: Analyze and visualize color frequencies with precision — organize your designs by the spectrum

plugins.name: Frame Tag - generator
plugins.description:
Create tags with the layer name outside the selected frame or component.


Frame tags are visible only in the Figma file, they help organize or mark selected frames in the assembly.


To customize the style of the label, choose a background and font color, then click Create.
plugins.tagline: Create tags with the layer name outside the selected frame or component.

plugins.name: Logify
plugins.description:
Logify — Version Tracking for Design Systems


Keep your design system consistent — and versioned. This plugin helps you track changes to local styles and components in your Figma file, presenting differences in a clean, structured changelog directly on the canvas.


No need to log edits manually — Logify detects added, modified, and removed elements automatically.


What you can do:

  1. Compare current and previous file states
  2. Generate visual changelogs inside your file
  3. Group updates by Added / Changed / Removed
  4. Document design system evolution clearly

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Effortless changelog for your design system

138839.name: Logify
138839.description:

plugins.name: Palette Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
🔹 Generate & Replace – Instantly create color palettes ranging from 3 to 11 colors and apply them with one click to your chosen variable collection or variable set.


🔹 Create New Variable Sets – Easily generate comprehensive color shade ranges (50 to 950) and organize them into a new variable set, perfect for design systems and UI consistency.


Whether you're managing a design system, refining UI themes, or simply exploring color variations, Palette Variable Replacer makes it effortless to update and apply color variables in Figma.


🚀 Simplify your color workflow today!
plugins.tagline: Replace or create color paletts directly to your variable collections
